name: agency

scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive

cancel: Fix problem with safari chrome bar -> navigation is not visible on landscape
Fix bug with letters when pattern goes where should not go
Optimize animation, analyze performance, create alternative for slow devices
in scroll-animation add class when element is not visible but is on top of current scroll position and this class add active animation style but without animation
Fixe problem with Firefox init letter dash animation -> the animation isn't smooth
Fixe problem with mobile form when form is submitted by keyboard
changelog: Added new active styles for the secondary-hover and primary-hover css component
Now are pages controlled with swaping from left to right and reverse
Divided fake scroll functions into new Home service "fakeScroll"
Changed background_color in manifest from primary blue to white color
